Desc.entry: A 62 bed voluntary sector residential home for older people. Includes 30 specialist care beds for Elderly Mentally Infirm (EMI) residents. Also provides daycare and respite facilities. Run by Sheffcare Ltd (see separate entry), a not-for-profit provider of care. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.

category.entry: CARE HOMES FOR OLDER PEOPLE (RESIDENTIAL HOMES)
